Highlights in Jazz #20: The Great Ellington Reunion / Soprano Summit - Al Hibbler, Brooks Kerr, Russell Procope, Sonny Greer, Francis Williams, Bob Wilber, Ken Davern, George Duvivier, Ken Rosengarden, Marty Grosz, Aaron Bell, Peter Dean (Tape 2 of 3)

Highlights in Jazz #20: The Great Ellington Reunion / Soprano Summit - Al Hibbler, Brooks Kerr, Russell Procope, Sonny Greer, Francis Williams, Bob Wilber, Ken Davern, George Duvivier, Ken Rosengarden, Marty Grosz, Aaron Bell, Peter Dean (Tape 2 of 3)

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "Entirety of tape suffers from a constant control track error. Multiple TBCs were tested to obtain the best capture possible. Content suffers from persistent flagging and image jitter throughout, as a result of the inherent control track error. Aside from these anomalies, there is recurring mild tape wear and dropouts, and occasional mild tape damage. Momentary severe sync errors occur twice."
